00017 class BamRead {

00019  public:
00020   
00023   BamRead();
00024 
00027   ~BamRead();
00028 
00030   inline bool ReverseFlag() { return (b->core.flag&BAM_FREVERSE) != 0; }
00031 
00033   inline bool MateReverseFlag() { return (b->core.flag&BAM_FMREVERSE) != 0; }
00034   
00036     inline int32_t Position() { return b->core.pos; }
00037 
00039     inline int32_t MatePosition() { return b->core.mpos; }
00040 
00042     inline int32_t ChrID() { return b->core.tid; }
00043 
00045     inline int32_t MateChrID() { return b->core.mtid; }
00046 
00048     inline bool MappedFlag() { return !(b->core.flag&BAM_FUNMAP); }
00049 
00051     inline bool MateMappedFlag() { return !(b->core.flag&BAM_FMUNMAP); }
00052         
00054     inline int32_t MapQuality() { return b->core.qual; }
00055 
00057     inline int32_t CigarSize() { return b->core.n_cigar; }
00058 
00060     inline bool FirstFlag() { return (b->core.flag&BAM_FREAD1); }
00061 
00063     inline std::string Qname() { return std::string(bam_get_qname(b)); }
00064 
00066     inline char* QnameChar() { return bam_get_qname(b); }
00067 
00069     inline int32_t AlignmentFlag() { return b->core.flag; }
00070 
00072     inline int32_t InsertSize() { return b->core.isize; } 
00073 
00075     inline int32_t Length() { return b->core.l_qseq; }
00076 
00078     inline std::string Sequence() { 
00079       uint8_t * p = bam_get_seq(b);
00080       char c[b->core.l_qseq+1]; // need +1 for \0 at end
00081       for (int32_t i = 0; i < b->core.l_qseq; ++i)
00082         c[i] = BASES[bam_seqi(p, i)];
00083       c[b->core.l_qseq] = '\0'; // null terminate for proper std::string construciton
00084       return std::string(c);
00085     }
00086 
00088     inline int32_t NumSoftClip() {
00089       int32_t p = 0;
00090       uint32_t* c = bam_get_cigar(b);
00091       for (int32_t i = 0; i < b->core.n_cigar; ++i)
00092         if (c[i] & BAM_CSOFT_CLIP)
00093           p += bam_cigar_oplen(c[i]);
00094       return p;
00095     }
00096 
00098     inline int32_t NumClip() {
00099       int32_t p = 0;
00100       uint32_t* c = bam_get_cigar(b);
00101       for (int32_t i = 0; i < b->core.n_cigar; ++i)
00102         if ( (c[i] & BAM_CSOFT_CLIP) || (c[i] & BAM_CHARD_CLIP) )
00103           p += bam_cigar_oplen(c[i]);
00104       return p;
00105     }
00106 
00111     inline std::string GetZTag(const std::string& tag) {
00112       uint8_t* p = bam_aux_get(b,tag.c_str());
00113       if (!p)
00114         return "";
00115       return std::string(bam_aux2Z(p));
00116         
00117     }
00118

00121

00123

00125 };
